name: Party Duel
description: Easy duel requests to many players at once, or auto duels with PK mode. Have fun battling your friends or enemies. Use '/pkstart' to start PK mode and '/pkend' to end it. '/partyduel' for help ingame

name: Kill Counter
description: Simple Kill Counter for GTW. '/killcounter' to see counter. '/killcounter help' for additional options. Remember to turn ON Battle Alarm and System Chat

name: Auto Match
description: Chat shortcuts for auto match content. Type '/automatch' or '/am' to see command list
